casebody.data:
STEVENS v. NOE et al. No. 11530 Opinion Filed July 10, 1923.

Commissioners’ Opinion,

Division No. 5. A O Markley, for plaintiff in error. A. M. Fowler and "Willmott & Roberts, for defendants in error.

Opinion by

THOMPSON, C.

The facts and issues in this case are similar to those in the case of Fred L. Stevens v. W. E. Grisso (No. 11520), decided on the 26th day of June, 1923, and the decision in that case is decisive of the questions involved in this case, and the opinion in that case is adopted as (he opinion in this case.

The judgment of the trial court is reversed and cause remanded, with directions to grant a new trial.

By the Court: It is so ordered.
